remark.en: Course level:intermediate.Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade.The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
remark.ch: 中文：限華語程度為中級之外籍生。一、第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。二、前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en: On successful completion of this course, students will be able to 1. propose a request, make an invitation, express personal opinions, giving comments and make a praise. 2. communicate and negotiate on the basis of daily life. 3. express their thoughts in a longer paragraph. 4. recognize Chinese characters which are commonly used.
goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應能： 1. 提出請求與邀約、表達意見、讚美他人 2. 在日常生活語境下，與人進行協商、溝通 3. 能運用常見的篇章記號，成段地表達出自己的意見 4. 能識讀漢字

content.en: The course will emphasize the development of students' listening and speaking proficiency, as well as their recognition of Chinese characters. In addition to the standard language lessons, students will participate in cultural activities designed to enhance their motivation to learn. The class comprises lectures, drills, and other verbal activities.
content.ch: 以聽、說能力培養為主，識讀漢字能力為輔。除了語言課程外，會另安排文化活動，以增強學生的學習動機。上課方式以講授、口語訓練與口語活動為主。另外，學生需主動學習指定內容，上課時參與課堂活動。

textbook.en: Practical Audio-Visual Chinese vol.1 3rd Edition ISBN： 9789860511963
textbook.ch: 《新版實用視聽華語1》－正中書局

grading.en: 1. Class participation: 25% 2. Homework: 25% 3. Quiz: 15% 4. Midterm: 15% 5. Final Project: 20%
grading.ch: 出席及課堂參與(Attendance and class participation): 30% 作業(Homework): 20% 小考(Quiz): 10% 期中評量(Midterm): 15% 期末評量(Final Project): 25%

flex_desc.en: The eighteenth week will be designated for review and final exams. Students can utilize the materials provided by the instructor for revision and to undertake the final written and oral assessments.
flex_desc.ch: 第十八週將為複習及期末考週，學生可利用教師給的資料複習，進行期末筆試及口試。
